#summary Roadmap

= Roadmap =

Project started in October 1999. Python binding started 6th of September 2011.

== Current status ==
 * conversion of FChronik to CSV (using the old Turbo Pascal tool)
 * import of FChronik in python
 * import of Ahnenblatt in python

== Aims ==
 * export to FChronik.ahn
 * export to Ahnenblatt.ahn
 * convert FChronik to Ahnenblatt & vice-versa
 * export to CSV (using python)
 * export to GEDCOM
